section.title: SHARED_CONSTANTS
Description
section.para: The intention of this class is to collect information that would be spread over the whole project otherwise. This helps adjusting the project and makes minor changes easier, as a constant (like line_width) only has to be changed a single time to take effects on the whole project. All classes that want to use constants or procedures from SHARED_CONSTANTS inherit from this class, but do not export the inherited features so that they are not visible in the interface.
section.title: Constants
section.para: In addition to constants of minor importance, such as line-/window- height and width, the most important one is plane_size which is used mostly in the classes MAP and BUILDING_EWER for calculations related to the distribution of buildings and other issues.
section.title: map_to_gl_coords
section.para: This query is of great importance to the project as it maps the coordinates in the XML files that vary from 0 to 1500 to the coordinates of the plane, which are in the range of -plane_size/2 to +plane_size/2. All coordinate transformations that have to be done call this procedure. This makes an adjustment to new coordinates in an XML file pretty easy, because only this feature would have to be changed.
